thread.title: BRIEF-USAF Selects UTC Aerospace Systems DB-110 Airborne Reconnaissance System For Multi-Nation Foreign Military Sales Acquisition

title: BRIEF-USAF Selects UTC Aerospace Systems DB-110 Airborne Reconnaissance System For Multi-Nation Foreign Military Sales Acquisition

organizations.name: multi-nation foreign military sales acquisition february
multi-nation foreign military sales acquisition reuters staff

text: February 21, 2018 / 1:55 PM / a minute ago BRIEF-USAF Selects UTC Aerospace Systems DB-110 Airborne Reconnaissance System For Multi-Nation Foreign Military Sales Acquisition Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - United Technologies Corp: * USAF SELECTS UTC AEROSPACE SYSTEMS DB-110 AIRBORNE RECONNAISSANCE SYSTEM FOR MULTI-NATION FOREIGN MILITARY SALES ACQUISITION * UTC AEROSPACE SYSTEMS - AWARDED INDEFINITE-DELIVERY/QUANTITY CONTRACT WITH INITIAL CEILING OF $22.9 MILLION FROM U.S. AIR FORCE * UTC AEROSPACE SYSTEMS - AWARDED AN INDEFINITE-DELIVERY/INDEFINITE-QUANTITY (IDIQ) CONTRACT WITH AN INITIAL CEILING OF $22.9 MILLION FROM U.S. AIR FORCE Source text: [ reut.rs/2HxZWm2 ] Further company coverage:
